100.name: Unknown Error
100.description: An error has occurred that has not been defined.

101.name: Invalid Verification Request
101.description: This happens when you try to verify a user with an invalid verification link.
101.instructions: If it has been over 10 minutes since you requested the verification email, you will need to request a new one by signing in again here.

102.name: Invalid Password Request Reset
102.description: This happens when you try to reset a password with an invalid password reset link.
102.instructions: If it has been over 10 minutes since you requested the password reset email, you will need to request a new one by repeating your steps from before.
